categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Storm was a group of 3 Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports that were used by the Rebel Alliance carrying commandos. They were part of a unsuccessful capture operation to disable a freighter called Mharsup that carried TIE Defender prototypes. Despite X-wing escort, they were all destroyed by Maarek Stele.
